Day One.
On our way, finally. The first maze opens up in front of us. It is simple at this point, we just have to collect a few keys and turn switches, ...
Many before us have not succeeded, but we are well ready. We'll discover the secrets of the Labyrinth. Fame and wealth await us!

Use arrows to move.
